name: Tonari no Utsukushii Hito
nutshell: Daichi, a University student, who can’t get used to the city life, has a problem. And that is, his beautiful next-door neighbour, Kikuchi, who loves bringing men home till morning. Even though Kikuchi always attracts jerks… Daichi didn’t know that he would fall in love with someone like him.

name: Okuretekita Renjou
nutshell: Tomoki is a playboy who thinks only about sex. But Kazuyuki, his supposed sex partner, confesses his love to Tomoki. Even though he thinks of this as bothersome, it starts to develop into a love game!

name: Sandu
nutshell:
"Can I bite you?"


Original Webtoon <Lezhin>

name: Kizuato ni Hana
nutshell:
Love, work, friendship, job hunting...
The tiny worries that everyone has.
For suffering that cannot be expressed in words
A human drama that inevitably empathizes with you. (MTL)

name: Let's Fight Ghost
nutshell: A boy named Park BongPal has psychic abilities to see, talk, and - get this - touch ghosts.

name: Shichi Ha Gojuroku
nutshell:
New Weekly Shounen Magazine series.
A "Love Comedy x Horror x Mystery" manga.
The story follows a teenage boy who wants to become popular with girls. A strange relationship starts after he finds a girl drowning in the river.

name: Mahou Tsukai no Hako - Starlit Marmalade
nutshell:
Chikagi Katsuragi enters Kagamisaki High School with the firm intention to have a quiet school life, but not if her hyperactive classmate Hino Hibiki has something to say about it!
Chikagi is fighting a losing battle, as she happens to be the younger sister of the wonderfully eccentric former Student Council President Chidori Katsuragi, and that alone assures that her high school life will be anything but quiet!

name: Katajikenai
nutshell:
A metaphorical depiction of Japan's apprehension concerning the advance of western culture in the country during the period preceding the Meiji Era.
Historical figures and psychedelic experiences are on the menu.

name: Too Late
nutshell: A belated Valentine's story.

name: Kekkon Suru Kara Shite mo ii Yone
nutshell:
Shizuku and her boyfriend, Daiki are high school students that live together. On top of that, they're married?! As "newlyweds", Shizuku has insecurities, particularly taking their relationship into the next level.
Official
https://www.cmoa.jp/title/124209/
https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/32960788-kekkon-suru-kara-shite-mo-ii-yone

name: Isekai Trip Shita Sono Bade Taberare Chaimashita
nutshell:
One day, I, Minakami Sakura, fell into the bath and when I realized it, I was on an unfamiliar bed! Even though I was misunderstood by the room owner and had a crisis of chastity after that, but because the other party is a dead-strike handsome knight, I was inadvertently eaten deliciously on the spot.♡
Popular web novel departs!
Female college student Sakura trips into a different world with just one bath towel and meets a stubborn and serious captain. A pure love story starting with a misunderstanding and a dogeza. Finally! Let's begin the show!

name: Money Crazy
nutshell:
When Futaro was five years old, his father left his home and his mother got sick in poverty.
Also, Futaro has a ugly face, like Quasimodo: he's been discriminated and treated like trash
by almost everyone in his neighborhood. Finally, his mother dies because they can't afford medical treatment.
Burying her body, Futaro makes up his mind to do anything for money…

name: Touhou - Summer of the Residents of a Touhou Town (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Patchy “hires” an assistant, Remi preps for a race, and summer wouldn’t be summer without a festival~

name: Engage Princess - Side・By・Side
nutshell:
Dengeki Bunko 25th Anniversary "Engage Princess" appeared in comics!
The stage is Dream World Maitopia. The big adventures of Marlin and Mysterious Rabbit begin!
based off a game created from eromanga sense and oreimo author

name: Zombie-Loan
nutshell:
Michiru Kita’s a weak-spirited girl who has a hard time saying what’s on her mind. One day, she notices mysterious, ring-like markings around the necks of two of her classmates, Chika Akatsuki and Shito Tachibana — two boys who miraculously survived a horrible accident six months before. Michiru, possessing the rare ability to see these rings, knows that they warn of impending death. Thinking that, perhaps, she can do something to save her classmates’ lives, she approaches them…but it seems the boys have already made a different kind of deal and garnered themselves a heavy debt.
[PL] Kita Michiru jest dziewczyną na posyłki. Drobna i nieśmiała, nie ma odwagi przeciwstawić się swoim koleżankom. Jednak pewne wydarzenia sprawiają, że uwalnia się od tego życia. Lecz jakim kosztem? Dlaczego Michiru nienawidzi, gdy ktoś ściąga jej okulary? Co jest w niej wyjątkowego? I dlaczego jej kumple z klasy to… ZOMBIE?!

name: Clash
nutshell:
Clash:
A prince at school and at home, Yama is the perfect student. Only when he is alone can he show his true self and his true personality. But, one day, a girl named Saku follows him to his villa and somehow she finds out about his true personality. What will happen now!?


Extra: Kimi to Iru Kyoushitsu:
About a girl who likes her childhood friend who is a player.

name: Haikyuu!! - Overflow (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Kageyama x Hinata

name: Blue Flame
nutshell: Mungaya’ who suffered from childhood trauma. At the newly transferred school, he meets Cha Ae-ri, the perfect model student and the beloved queen. Gaya gradually falls in love with her dangerous and beautiful woman, and something inside that has been suppressed begins to awaken. ‘Can we be free in this hell?’

name: Gikyoudai
nutshell:
"A classmate suddenly became my 'older brother'…?"
High-school student Shinozaki Aya can't help but take care of others. The only one to relieve her burden is her classmate and close friend Haruki. But what will happen when they learn about their parents' remarriage to one another? Will they really be able to become siblings?

name: The Crossdressing Boy Who Lets Him Fondle
Shin Gumiho
nutshell: Shin Gumiho (Shin meaning "new" and Gumiho meaning "nine-tailed fox") begins with its origins based on Korean folklore. The 9-tailed demon fox, Gumiho, wishes to change into a human in order to keep her promise to the one she loved. However, right before she turns into a human, a vengeful demon-purger arrives and seals her into a sword. Now, in present day Korea, a young boy has found the sword and its contents. Gumiho is reawakened, but what will she do now?

name: Light of Your Soul
tags: Official Colored,Historical,Long Strip,Boys' Love,Martial Arts,Adventure,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell:
Hace mil años, Lu Lingxi se involucró en el Cultivo Demoníaco, causando una guerra entre
miles de espíritus. Para detener a Lu Lingxi, Mu Feng sacrificó su cuerpo y alma. Lu Lingxi
tomó prestada la Linterna Espiritual de Ye Li, el Líder de los Demonios, para devolver el
cuerpo a Mu Feng, desafortunadamente su alma se dispersó en el mundo mortal, por lo que
Lu Lingxi no tuvo más remedio que bajar, para recolectar los fragmentos Xin (del alma) en
compañía del joven Mu Feng. Inesperadamente, Ye Li, demonios y humanos que tienen los
fragmentos Xin parecen tener un gran interés en Lu Lingxi...

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Shiba Tatsuya Ansatsu Keikaku
nutshell:
The Spring of 2094 AD. A young girl whose calling is assassination, Hashibami Yuki, is witnessed by a young middle school boy at the scene of a crime.
Supressing misgivings about erasing a young middle-schoolboy, Yuki’s superior abilities cannot compete at all. The name of the mysterious boy is Shiba Tatsuya.
If the opponent was a normal boy,
If the opponent was not a magician,
If the opponent was not Shiba Tatsuya—
An "irregular" boy and an "assassin" girl. The meeting of these two will alter fate and bring misfortune.

name: Niji wa Yako ni Kirameku
nutshell: Nakajima, who enjoys traveling alone got lost wandering on a legendary mountain of many rumors. He was helped by Kanzawa, who lives alone nearby. In the midst of his purposeless journey, Nakajima is fascinated by Kanzawa, who lives like a recluse. This is the story of Kanzawa who lives quietly on a secluded mountain and Nakajima who comes from a crowded city.

name: Love Me Dramatically
nutshell:
“I’m dreaming of a soap opera like love."
Wooshin Hyung replied with that line on the day Kijoong finally confessed to him. Kijoong initially thought that Hyung’s words had meant “be good to me.” But as time passed and he started to fully understand Hyung, he realized the true meaning: that Hyung wanted their relationship to literally be like a soap opera.

name: The Astrometry
nutshell:
From Loyal Kiss:
Student Quibenyi (aka “Master Qui") has two things people like to talk about: his “light hair” and his “poison tongue”. Anyway, girls at school fall for him and his friend, Shegu, all the time. Our female main character, Xindu, plans on confessing Shegu, the guy she likes. But something goes wrong…
(So far only half of the oneshot has been translated.)

name: Akira No. 2
nutshell: The "yankee" (delinquent) manga follows Akira the No. 2, a boy in high school that is full of students with disciplinary issues. The story follows the battles within the student body for the alpha male position.

name: The Reincarnated Young Lady Aims to Be an Adventurer!
nutshell:
The fluffy and strongest Holy Beast! One day Seraphione, a nobleman's daughter, met Roux and recalled her previous life's memories of a japanese woman in her thirties. [I've been reborn in another world, and not only that but I'm a villainess–?!] If they find out about my cheat magic then it means the destruction end!
However, although she knows that, she still loves magic and carelessly enters into a magical contract with Roux. If it continues like this it'll become dangerous! In that case let's train and aim to become an adventurer!

ComicWalker
